author: gartung
body: The proposed usage would be to add `<use="PerfTools/JeProf" />` to a package `Buildfile.xml` and then make a call to `cms::jeprof::makeHeapDump()` in your code to produce a Heap Profile with the filename passed as an argument.
title: PerfTools/JeProf: Make a library that allows a call to jemalloc profile heap dump function.
